step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Ensure your arms are stretched fully overhead and your fingers are spread wide.
You're making a good fist and pushing down. Try to squeeze your shoulder blades together a bit more as you tighten your muscles.
Excellent! You're stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. Keep up the good work relaxing and breathing.
Great job on the repetitions. Remember to focus on the squeezing motion of your shoulder blades as you push down.
You're doing well with the arm movements. Continue to focus on the full range of motion and controlled breathing.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arms overhead with fingers spread, then make a fist while squeezing your shoulder blades. Exhale as you relax and return your arms overhead.
